concept.title: The s.sa() Function
concept.shortdesc: The s.sa() function lets you dynamically change a report suite at any time on the page, before or after an image request fires.

conbody.p: If your organization wants to send data to different report suites without a page reload, using this function is strongly recommended.

This information is suited for advanced users who are well-versed in both reporting and implementation. Do not attempt to make any edits to your implementation without complete knowledge of its consequences. If you require implementation changes, contact your organization's Account Manager.

section.p: Setting this function takes all previously defined variables and lets them be used in a different report suite.
Sending video data to one report suite while sending the rest to another:
